meta.title: Terms of Service - sprunki phase 3 Game

title: Terms of Service
intro: This Terms of Service agreement sets forth the terms and conditions for use of sprunki phase 3 Game website. By using our website, you agree to these terms.

service.title: 1. Service Description
service.description: sprunki phase 3 Game provides a web-based platform for playing HTML5 games. Our service allows users to access and play various games through our website.

content.title: 2. Content and Usage
content.description: Users are expected to use our gaming platform responsibly:

rules.0: Games are provided for entertainment purposes only
rules.1: Users must not attempt to modify or hack the games
rules.2: Users must not use any cheating tools or exploits
rules.3: Users must not engage in any activity that disrupts the gaming experience for others

availability.title: 3. Service Availability
availability.description: We strive to maintain high availability of our service, but we do not guarantee uninterrupted access.
availability.interruptions: The service may be temporarily unavailable due to maintenance or technical issues.

liability.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, sprunki phase 3 Game shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of our service.

governing.title: 5. Governing Law

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
